description: Padded Cell - Straight stud Jimmy Bullet thinks he's ready for the test that 30MT has in store for him. He starts off in the padded cell with a straight jacket on to keep him in place. Van beats his ass red and ragdoll's him around the cell, stomping on Jimmy's balls before taking him off to the pit. - The Pit - With his hands behind his back, Jimmy has weights added to his balls for extra torment as his backside is beaten with the flogger. Once his balls are nice and tender, Jimmy moves on to his final challenge. - The Water Chamber - Chained to the wall, the bound stud has clover clamps attached all across his torso and even on his balls, the pain driving him crazy as water is sprayed on his clamps. Screaming at the top of his lungs each clamp is removed from Jimmy's tender skin before he's challenged to cum.
title: Straight hunk Jimmy Bullet pushes his limits to the max!
